subject: Delay in AHU delivery
body: The air handling unit shipment will arrive 2 days later due to customs delay. We apologize for the inconvenience and will expedite once released from customs.

subject: Need clarification on door hardware spec
body: Verify if Section 087100 allows for substitution of brand. The specified manufacturer's lead time is 12 weeks. Please advise ASAP.

subject: Weekly Safety Inspection Report - 4 violations found
body: During today's inspection at Site B, we identified 4 safety violations including missing fall protection on Level 3 and improper scaffolding setup. Immediate action required.

subject: RFI: Water meter installation location
body: We need clarification on the exact mounting height for the commercial water meters in the mechanical room. Current drawings show conflicting measurements.

subject: Submittal package for panelboards ready for review
body: The complete submittal package for Panelboards A through D is ready for your review. Includes shop drawings, cut sheets, and test data. Due date: 5/15/2024.

subject: Concrete pour scheduled for tomorrow delayed
body: The scheduled concrete pour for the foundation slab on 4/10/2024 has been postponed due to adverse weather conditions. New target date: 4/12/2024.

subject: Revised drawing set issued - Version 2.1
body: Please note that drawing set Version 2.1 has been issued with updated dimensions for the elevator shaft. All trades must download and review before proceeding with installations.

subject: Coordination meeting for mechanical systems scheduled
body: Emergency coordination meeting scheduled for Friday 2pm to address MEP conflicts detected in the BIM model. All trade foremen attendance mandatory.

subject: Low stock alert: Rebar #4 scheduled for next phase
body: Current inventory of #4 rebar is below minimum threshold. We need to reorder immediately to avoid delay on the next foundation phase starting next week.

subject: Building permit inspection scheduled
body: Your building permit inspection for plumbing rough-in has been scheduled for Monday, April 15th at 9:00 AM. Please ensure all plumbing fixtures are properly installed and accessible.

subject: Debris removal complete for Phase 1
body: All construction debris from Phase 1 has been removed and disposed of properly. Certificate of disposal has been uploaded to the project portal.

subject: Site walk scheduled with owner next Tuesday
body: Please prepare the site for the owner walkthrough on Tuesday at 2:00 PM. Owner wants to see progress on the lobby area and verify finish selections.
